summary: I should have listened to everyone that warned against it. IM NEVER ORDERING FROM THE BTS OFFICIAL SHOP EVER AGAIN. I ordered...
body: I should have listened to everyone that warned against it. IM NEVER ORDERING FROM THE BTS OFFICIAL SHOP EVER AGAIN. I ordered like within the first 20 minutes of preorders on 4/18 and it’s 6/6 and that shit hasn’t even SHIPPED YET. Wtf am I spending $50+ on shipping for?

summary: So, apparently, there's this whole dark side of Tweetland i didn't know about. Now I'm thinking i may make a fan acct there, to...
body: So, apparently, there’s this whole dark side of Tweetland i didn’t know about. Now I’m thinking i may make a fan acct there, to support some people. Been thinking of a fan acct for a minute anyway, just bc my sports fan side doesn’t mesh 😁 but we’ll see. Either way, i love watching kookmin videos on YT. They make me so warm, even discounting the overblown looks exchanged parts. And i pretty much discount everything that happens on stage bc i think they go into a different headspace to perform. (Yet, i wouldn’t be surprised if there is some carryover to their passion offstage.) just sharing thoughts

title: ✾ Bloody Hands ✾
body:
➵ Author: srmol 

➵ Genre: Angst, Assassin!au, Gang!au.

➵ Pairing: Suga (Min Yoongi) x Reader

➵ Warning(s): A single swear word.

➵ Description: Yoongi is the biggest target for every gang in South Korea. Trying to kill him would just lead to absolute failure. What happens when an assassin in the shadows gives it a shot? 

➵ Posted On: 6th of June, 2018

PROLOGUE

“What do you mean by this?!” 

“I meant what I said, Kim.” 

“I do not approve of this! I-I can’t risk it! How can I explain this to-”

“KIM.” His voice echoes through the room, shushing everyone and stopping them from whatever they were doing. “You have no right in talking about this. These are the rules that you agreed to,” He smirks. “Or shall we remind you about what we had done to you all these years?” He raises an eyebrow at the figure that was now hunching forward with his eyes looking at the ground and his hands fiddling with each other.

“Aye, take it easy man. She’s still young for all this anyway.” His friend puts his hand on his shoulder to calm him down. The guy holds up a hand at him to stop him from speaking any further. His friend sighs, shrugging at ‘Kim’ in hopelessness. 

The man sits down on his chair and stares at ‘Kim’ for a minute or two. He raises an eyebrow at him when he hears a sniffle coming from his way. He felt his heart ache. Pain. Sadness. Regret. 

He was finally feeling, what normal people call, emotions. And he absolutely hated it. 

He stood up and picked ‘Kim’ up from his jacket. He pulled him close to his face so that he’d be able to his face clearly. His eyes and nose were red, and his lips were quivering. 

“Listen carefully, you fuck.” He whispered in his ear. “We won’t do anything to her.” ‘Kim’ almost sighed in relief. “But she will start training when she becomes at least 5 years old.” His eyes widened. She was only 2. She was too young for all of this. She was too young to discover this world.

“If you dare to disagree,” He starts. “We will be sure that you’ll be sleeping in your lovely wife’s cold, blue arms.” He smirks and looks at him intently. He knew that his weak point was his wife. You can do anything to anyone but his wife. ‘Kim’ looks at the floor.

More tears were building up in his eyes. He couldn’t imagine the feeling of his loved being lifeless in front of him. The man smiles in satisfaction and drops him to the floor. He turns on his heel and towards the door along with his men. He puts his hand on the doorknob but didn’t twist it. He looks at his side and speaks,

“She’ll have the same bloody hands, Kim. Just like yours.”
